item.description:
Buffett and I invite those with or without dogs to join us on our weekly outings.

These are informal hikes and can be flexible but details may not be firmed up until the day of the hike and depending on interest expressed.  We welcome suggestions as to type or location (ie. something flat, hilly, long, short, new or established trail.)

Suggestions are welcome.  Post to the hike or email me through the website.  I believe I have turned off the reminders so no one will be flooded with emails cluttering their mailboxes.

PLEASE NOTE:  If someone emails me with a request, I will try to accommodate.  ALWAYS CHECK TIME AND PLACE BEFORE HEADING OUT.

See you at the headquarters parking lot unless otherwise noted.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Let's get the dogs out!
